column4: anybody?  --->Can anybody tell me what package Ubuntu uses for keyboard keybindings? I have a logitech keyboard and some of the multimedia keyboard and a few of the keys are not working. I didn't manually install any package so i assume there is one enabled by default. BTW, this is on Feisty
Flannel -- not sure what that means
go to System > PReferences > Keyboard Shortcuts
That's the built in settings, right? Does keytouch override them or do they have to be disabled if keytouch is installed
